name: Velvet Trio Fan game
description:
An entry for @Poichanchan velvet trio DTIYS, 

A small one shot game staring the Persona 5 Royal trio.  Because of the velvet room attendees taking a day vacation, The trio is spending their day in the velvet room. Let's join them into velvet room to see what are they up to.

Designs are made by https://twitter.com/poichanchan?s=21 , go check her out for amazing art!!
